Psalms__52.1: Unto the end, for <u>Maeleth</u>, understandings to David. The fool said in his heart: There is no God.
Psalms__52.2: They are corrupted, and become abominable in iniquities: there is none that doth good.
Psalms__52.3: God looked down from heaven on the children of men: to see if there were any that did understand, or did seek God.
Psalms__52.4: All have gone aside, they are become unprofitable together, there is none that doth good, no not one.
Psalms__52.5: Shall not all the workers of iniquity know, who eat up my people as they eat bread?
Psalms__52.6: They have not called upon God: there have they trembled for fear, where there was no fear. For <u>God hath scattered the bones</u> of them that please men: they have been confounded, because God hath despised them.
Psalms__52.7: Who will give out of Sion the salvation of Israel? when God shall bring back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
